abstracts.cdata!:
The project provides over a five-year
            period technical assistance to enable the Borrower and the
            State of Madhya Pradesh to develop and prepare wood
            processing schemes based on the forest resource in the
            Bastar district of Madhya Pradesh. The project would
            comprise a major industrial feasibility study to provide the
            basis for determining the location, size and configuration
            of forest industries that could be established and would
            include a program of research trials, pilot operations and
            studies to solve the technical, economic, environmental and
            sociological problems that would arise from large scale
            clearfelling and reforestation.
